columns.name: stop_id
columns.dc:description: An identifier for the bus stop.

columns.name: stop_name
columns.dc:description: The name of the bus stop.

columns.name: stop_desc
columns.dc:description: A description for the bus stop.

columns.name: stop_lat
columns.dc:description: The latitude of the bus stop.

columns.name: stop_long
columns.dc:description: The longitude of the bus stop.

columns.name: zone_id
columns.dc:description: An identifier for the zone where the bus stop is located.

columns.name: stop_url
columns.dc:description: URL that identifies the bus stop.
